subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jozy Altidore’s selection is perhaps the best in the miserable draft history of the Red Bulls franchise, and perhaps the last, best vestige of an otherwise forgettable 15-game Mo Johnston era.
snippet: Jozy Altidore’s selection is perhaps the best in the miserable draft history of the Red Bulls franchise, and perhaps the last, best vestige of an otherwise forgettable 15-game Mo Johnston era.
